scripts.dev-testnet: concurrently "yarn run server" "yarn run client" "yarn --cwd ./worker/ run dev"
scripts.dev: tsx node_modules/.bin/concurrently "yarn run api" "sleep 10 && yarn run client" "yarn run worker" "sleep 5 && yarn run events" "sleep 5 && yarn run dispatcher" "yarn run hardhat:node" "sleep 5 && yarn run hardhat:dev"
scripts.docker:build: yarn run docker:build:api && yarn run docker:build:client && yarn run docker:build:events && yarn run docker:build:worker
scripts.docker:push: docker push csleary/gridfire-api && docker push csleary/gridfire-client && docker push csleary/gridfire-web3-dispatcher && docker push csleary/gridfire-web3-events && docker push csleary/gridfire-worker
scripts.hardhat:deploy:mainnet: yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat compile --force && yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat deploy --network arb-mainnet
scripts.hardhat:deploy: yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat --network localhost run scripts/deploy-dev.ts
scripts.hardhat:dev: yarn run hardhat:compile && yarn run hardhat:deploy && yarn run hardhat:fund
scripts.hardhat:fund: yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat run --network localhost scripts/fundAccounts.ts
scripts.hardhat:upgrade:mainnet: yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat compile --force && yarn workspace @gridfire/hardhat hardhat upgrade
